Package edu.rit.m2mp.ip

Package edu.rit.m2mp.ip contains Many-to-Many Protocol (M2MP) channel implementations that use UDP datagrams to convey M2MP packets.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
IPChannelAddress Class IPChannelAddress encapsulates a channel address for the IP-based channel implementations in the Many-to-Many Protocol (M2MP).
IPMulticastChannel Class IPMulticastChannel encapsulates a broadcast Channel in the Many-to-Many Protocol (M2MP) that uses UDP multicast.
IPUnicastChannel Class IPUnicastChannel encapsulates a point-to-point Channel in the Many-to-Many Protocol (M2MP) that uses UDP.
M2MPRouter Class M2MPRouter is a main program that routes M2MP messages among processes in the local host and in other hosts on the network.
M2MPRouterChannel Class M2MPRouterChannel provides a Many-to-Many Protocol (M2MP) Channel implementation that uses an M2MPRouter running in a separate process to broadcast M2MP messages.
 

Package edu.rit.m2mp.ip Description

Package edu.rit.m2mp.ip contains Many-to-Many Protocol (M2MP) channel implementations that use UDP datagrams to convey M2MP packets.

M2MP Library Version 02-Jul-2002
